def_cn: 不喜欢;不赞成;受冷遇;失宠
def_en: If someone or something is in disfavour, people dislike or disapprove of them. If someone or something falls into disfavour, people start to dislike or disapprove of them.

def_cn: (表情流露出的)不喜欢,不赞成
def_en: If you look at someone or something with disfavour, the expression on your face shows that you dislike or disapprove of them.
